exam.question: The poetry of Ezra Pound is sometimes difficult to understand because it contains so many ______ references.

answer.explain: 句意： 埃兹拉·庞德的诗有些难懂， 因为诗中含有许多非常晦涩的典故。acute： 敏锐的； notable： 值得注意的， 显著的； objective： 客观的。

exam.question: Very few people understood his lecture, the subject of which was very ______.

answer.explain: 句意： 几乎没人能听懂他的演讲， 其主题过于晦涩。dim： 暗淡的， 无光的； conspicuous： 显著的； intelligible： 可理解的。

exam.question: Very few people could understand the lecture the professor delivered because its subject was very______.

answer.explain: 句意： 很少有人能听懂这位教授的演讲， 因为他选的题目太晦涩了。indefinite： 模糊的， 含糊的； dubious： 可疑的； 不确定的； intriguing： 迷人的， 有迷惑力的。

synos.tran: 模糊的；晦涩的；[光]昏暗的

remMethod.val: obs(看作ob， 强调) ＋ cur(流) ＋ e → 流下的泪水模糊了她的视线 → 模糊不清的

words.tran: 朦胧；阴暗；晦涩；身份低微；不分明

trans.tranOther: not well known and usually not very important
